name: Humpty Dumpty Hypnotherapy
description: I facilitate FREEDOM & HEALING for anyone ready to make a deep and lasting change in their lives. Whether you are looking for an effective way to break old habits, overcome fears, enhance work or personal performance or improve overall well-being; I’m glad you’ve found me. Perhaps you feel like you’ve already tried therapy or other practices before but our approach is different. I hold a safe space for you to access your inner mind to free yourself from obstacles, self-limiting or unhelpful beliefs and negative emotions which hold you back. Expect to feel relaxed and always in control when we put your nervous system at ease.
features: We treat every client as a very important person.
We provide a safe & relaxed space for the person to explore his feelings & thoughts in a non-judgemental space.
We provide a wide range of bespoke services to meet your needs.
Headline: Fast, Effective, Lasting Results Based Therapy to help you manage stress, anxiety and depression etc.
ShortDescription:
Humpty Dumpty offer Rapid Transformational Therapy® for your mental health needs. 
 Free initial consultation. Enjoy permanent, lasting results.
enhanced_description: Humpty Dumpty Hypnotherapy provides Rapid Transformational Therapy® (RTT) designed to facilitate deep and lasting change for individuals seeking freedom and healing. This fast, effective, and results-based therapy helps manage stress, anxiety, depression, break old habits, overcome fears, and enhance both work and personal performance, leading to overall well-being. The approach differs from traditional therapies by offering a safe, relaxed, and non-judgmental space where clients can access their inner mind to free themselves from obstacles, self-limiting beliefs, and negative emotions, while always remaining in control and with their nervous system at ease. The service emphasizes permanent, lasting results and offers a free initial consultation. It treats every client as a very important person, offering a wide range of bespoke services to meet individual needs.
key_use_cases: Freeing individuals from obstacles, self-limiting or unhelpful beliefs, and negative emotions
competitive_advantages: Focus on fast, effective, and lasting/permanent results
Provides a safe, relaxed, and non-judgmental space
Clients remain in control during sessions
Offers bespoke services to meet individual needs
roi_benefits: Achievement of deep and lasting personal and professional change
Effective management and reduction of stress, anxiety, and depression
Overcoming self-limiting beliefs and negative emotions for personal freedom
primary_users: Individuals seeking personal development or healing
